body.p: 1. Harhas’s son, father of Shallum, and the father-in-law of Huldah the prophetess (2 Kgs 22:14); alternately called Tokhath (kjv “Tikvath”) in 2 Chronicles 34:22.
2. Father of Jahzeiah, who was one of the four individuals on record who opposed Ezra’s command to divorce foreign wives (Ezr 10:15).
